original_text: The man who was now well stood in front of the Jewish leaders. They could see that his legs had become strong again. So they could not say anything against Peter and John.
korean_text: 또 병 나은 사람이 그들과 함께 서 있는 것을 보고 비난할 말이 없는지라

sentences.original_text: The man who was now well
stood in front of the Jewish leaders
that his legs had become strong again
So they could not say anything
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 아무 말도 할 수 없었다
